priority: PRIORITY 1.3: Regulatory Compliance During Gap Period
objective: Document any regulatory issues or violations during gap period

findings.status: No publicly available DPOR disciplinary actions found
findings.note: DPOR complaint database is not publicly accessible. Formal complaints must be filed through DPOR's complaint process.

complaint_filing_info.address: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation, Compliance and Investigations Division, Complaint Analysis & Resolution, 9960 Mayland Drive, Suite 400, Richmond, Virginia 23233-1485
complaint_filing_info.statute_of_limitations: 3 years from act, omission, or occurrence
complaint_filing_info.disclosure: All complaints subject to public disclosure once case is closed

dpor_complaints.notes: DPOR complaint database is not publicly accessible. FOIA request required for historical complaint records. BBB shows 46 complaints with 57% unanswered rate.

findings.details: BBB complaint: leaks, uncleaned carpets, inadequate management response
